patterns: Hey Jessie can I get some details of Sigiriya Rock.
responses: Sigiriya is an ancient rock fortress and palace built by king kashyapa during the regin of 473-495 which is standing majestically 660 feet strait up.It is located in the northern matale district near the town of Dambulla in central province of srilanka.

patterns: Hii Jessie what are the places we could travel in Anuradhapura?
responses: Check out the beautiful heritage City by visiting Mihintale,Jaya Sri Maha Bodhiya, Admire Isurumuniya, Ratna Prasada Guard stone, Kuttam pokuna(Twin pond), Moonstone of Abhayagiri Vihara, Ruwanweliseya StupaSa and madhi Buddha Statue.

patterns: hey Jessie let me know some beautiful Destinations in nuwara Eliya
responses: You can visit Haggala gardens, Vitoria garden and also you can visit gegory lake. Enjoy your Tour!

patterns: Hey Jessie tell me what are the most beautifull falls in Srilanka?
responses: Nuwara Eliya is one of the most exuberant places in sri lanka where you can spend some time amidst verdant greenery. You could visit Victoria park, Gregory Lake, Moon plains, Ambewela Farm, Ramboda Falls, St.Clair’s Falls,Laxapana Falls,Aberdeen Falls,Hakgala Botanical garden,Lipton Seat,  Bomburu Ella Falls , Devon Falls and Hortain Plains National park.

patterns: Jessie, How many museums are there in Sri lanka?

patterns: hey jessie what are the adventures activities we could do in srilankan?

patterns: Hey Jessie tell me some awesome things to do in Srilanka?

patterns: Hey Jessie can you give me a brief description on Adams Peak?
responses: Adams Peak is a 2243m (7359 ft) tall conical mountain located in central Sri lanka. It is well known for the Sri Pada “Sacred Footprint”, a 1.8m rock formation near the summit, which in Buddhist tradition is held to be the footprint of the Buddha, in Hindu tradition that of Hanuman or shiva.

patterns: Jessie let me know the charges of Anuradhapura sightseeing?
responses: They charge USD 25 per person.

patterns: Hi Jessie, can I get some details of Dambulla Cave Temple?
responses: A sacred pilgrimage site for 22 centuries, this cave monastery, with its five sanctuaries, is the largest, best preserved cave-temple complex in Srilanka. The Buddhist mural paintings (covering an area of 2100 m2) are of particular importance, as are the 157 statues.

patterns: Jessie at what time Kandy Cultural dance show starts at?
responses: It starts at 5.30 p.m

patterns: Hey Jessie where we could watch Kandy Cultural dance Show?
responses: You could watch them at Young Men Buddhist Association and at Kandy Avanhala.

patterns: Hey Jessie what are the Bottle feeding Hours for baby elephants at Pinnawala Elephant orphanage?

patterns: Hi Jessie, What are the bathing times of elephants at Pinnawala Elephant orphanage?
responses: Bathing times at the river is at 10.00 am and 2.00 pm.

patterns: Jessie can I know at what time Peradeniya Botanical Garden Opens?
responses: Monday to Saturday it opens at 08.00 am to 5.30 pm, Sundays 8.15 am to 5.30 pm.

patterns: Hey Jessie what is the Whale watching season in Sri Lanka?
responses: The Whale watching season in Sri lanka runs from November until April.

patterns: Jessie, where we could buy good Spices? Spice Garden or Super markets?
responses: We prefer the Spice Garden.

patterns: Jessie let me know about Hot water springs in Sri Lanka?
responses: The Kanniya Hot sprins is a site with hot wells located in Trincomalee, Sri Lanka. There are seven wells in a suare shape. Wells are only 3-4 feet deep and you can clearly see the bottom. The temperature is considerably high but vary slightly from one spring to another.

patterns: Hey Jessie what is the best time to go on Yala safari?
responses: For Birds watching we prefer Morning and for Leopard watching we prefer the evening.

patterns: Jessie Where we could see Gem factories in Sri Lanka?
responses: You could see Gem factories in Kandy and Ratnapura.

patterns: Jessie, Where we could purchase best Ceylon Tea?
responses: Nuwaraeliya.

patterns: Hey Jessie, What is the best way to exchange currency? Bank or Money exchangers?
responses: It depends on the converting rate. But usually Money exchangers offer good prices.

patterns: Jessie it is safe to exchange currency at Money exchanger?
responses: You are always safe with licensed authorized Money dealers.
